title: Fix X/Twitter embed overflow in chat messages

requirements.summary: Add CSS styling to prevent Twitter/X embed content from overflowing its container in MessageBubble component
acceptanceCriteria: Twitter/X embeds render within their container boundaries without horizontal overflow
Embeds maintain proper aspect ratio and responsiveness
No layout breaking on mobile or desktop viewports

file_operations.description: Add CSS constraints to the Twitter embed container div to prevent overflow. Apply max-width: 100%, overflow: hidden, and ensure the twitter-tweet class elements respect their parent container width. Add inline styles or className props to the div wrapping the Twitter embed (dangerouslySetInnerHTML section) to enforce width constraints and prevent horizontal scrolling.
